title: Quests
content:
Quests in Baldur's Gate 3 are the various expeditions and missions that a player can acquire and embark on throughout the game. Quests are usually unlocked through the main campaign, during a series of events, or are given by certain NPCs. Completing a quest also grants various rewards that can aid the player throughout their journey. This page covers a full list of all Quests in Baldur's Gate 3 which can be unlocked or obtained in the game.
